## Primitive.(constructor)

Create an empty primitive.

Defaults: - Primitive type: 'triangle-list' - `indexStart = 0`<!-- -->, `indexCount = null` (auto-computed) - No vertex/index buffers attached - No bounding volume

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor();
```
